name: ReminderAlertView
summary: A alert view that can remind regularly
description:
ReminderAlertView is inspired by Appirater (https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/appirater)
Appirater is only for app review. ReminderAlertView has high versatility.
You can use ReminderAlertView according to your application. For app review, push notification, and etc.
